exports.name: EventBusOptions
exports.description: Configuration options for EventBus construction. Fields: maxListeners (number) and debug (boolean).

exports.name: EventHandler
exports.description: Generic handler function type: (payload: T) => void. Used by subscribe/once handlers.

exports.name: EventBus
exports.description: Main EventBus class providing methods: subscribe, once, unsubscribe, publish, clear, getSubscriberCount, listEvents. Construct with optional EventBusOptions.
